title: Daniel Usvat
text: Daniel Usvat (born 2 November 1973) is a <a href="Romanian%20people">Romanian</a> former <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who played as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. Usvat started his career at <a href="FC%20Bihor%20Oradea">Bihor Oradea</a>, than played also for <a href="FC%20Farul%20Constan%C8%9Ba">Farul Constanța</a> before moving in <a href="Hungary">Hungary</a> where he played the rest of his career, for teams such as: <a href="Szombathelyi%20Halad%C3%A1s">Haladás</a>, <a href="Cegl%C3%A9di%20VSE">Cegléd</a>, <a href="Videoton%20FC">Videoton</a> or <a href="P%C3%A1pai%20FC">Lombard Pápa</a>, among others.
